column5:
An earthen embankment
constructed by local public
at village Belpara has been
affected due to incessant
rain and rising water level
of Boko River.
column11:
The earthen
embankment
was
previously
breached on
6th June,
2024. There
was ongoing
temporary
breach close
work carried
out by W.R
Dept.
However,
rising water
level of Boko
River
affected the
ongoing
temporary
breach gap
close section.
As reported
by concerned
Gaon
Pradhan and
also
inspected by
staff of Boko
Revenue
Circle and
field staff of
W.R Dept. It
is to be
mentioned
here that it is
not a
designated
embankment
of W.R Dept.
